I would like to challenge Wraith to a debate about whether or not making abortion illegal will plausibly cause more babies to be abandoned.
 
 For the sake of this debate abandoned will be referred to as either left at a care facility or left out in the street but does not refer to someone giving their child up for adoption.
 
 Also, plausibly was added by Wraith to mean "likely" I assume.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Abortions and Abandoned Babies
